Text: A/10, V/10, crystal clear video, audio unreal, English subs that work, excellent all round effort and a good movie to boot.  You are gifted CODYBOSS1969, keep up the good work and thank you.

@babybluetits24:

It's a picturization of a novel: "Mutiny" by Frank Tilsley [Not a history book!].

H.M.S. Defiant is a fictitious name, but the historical events were real around that time :
